title: Docusaurus Chapter Frontmatter Schema
description: Schema for validating the frontmatter of Docusaurus textbook chapters.

description.description: A brief description or summary of the chapter.

slug.description: The URL-friendly slug for the chapter.

week.description: The week number to which the chapter belongs (1-13).

module.description: The module name to which the chapter belongs.

prerequisites.description: A list of chapter slugs that are prerequisites for this chapter.

learningObjectives.description: A list of learning objectives for the chapter.

estimatedTime.description: Estimated time to complete the chapter in minutes.

difficultyLevel.description: The difficulty level of the chapter.

assessmentType.description: The type of assessment associated with this chapter (optional).

sidebar_label.description: The label to display in the sidebar. Defaults to title if not provided.

position.description: The position of the chapter in the sidebar. Lower numbers appear higher.
